title: Step2 Fantasy Vanity
description: Fashion is always fun with the Fantasy Vanity! This vanity adds glamour to young preteens' beauty routine.

asset.author: Step2
asset.description: Fashion is always fun with the Fantasy Vanity! This vanity adds glamour to young preteens' beauty routine. For more information, visit http://www.step2.com/p/Fantasy-Vanity

transcripts: If you've got a little princess in the house, the fantasy vanity will add some glit and glamour to her dress up routine. It's soft colors and fairy tale design are right at home with any little girls bedroom or playroom. The pretty pink vanity surface is adorned with sweet rose decals and built in storage areas. You're little princess can sit on the included stool and apply her pretend or real makeup in front of the shatter proof plastic mirror. There's even a built in push button light to eliminate her reflection. The fantasy vanity comes with a three piece accessory set of hand mirror brush and comb and there's plenty of storage space in the built in compartments and slide out drawer. When it comes to kids furniture it doesn't get much sturdier or more charming than the Fantasy Vanity from step two.
